title: Kostějova podstata (svitek)
content:
Kostějova podstata

Notes contain the formula for a potion made with a koshchey heart. The potion grants 1 Gold Talent when consumed.

This potion can only be brewed if Geralt defeats the koschey conjured by Azar Javed and obtains the primary ingredient, its heart.

Zápisy do deníku

Receptury: Kostějova podstata

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
800  	160  




Lokace
tělo Azar Javed
